alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 9:13PM CDT until May 24 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN TEXAS COUNTY... At 913 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Tyrone, or 14 miles southwest of Liberal, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Hooker, Baker and Adams. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
